description: Used to send and receive updates about SupervisorContainers. Sent from a GNodeRegistry to a World, and used also by the World as it spawns GNodeInstances in docker instances (i.e., the SupervisorContainers).

UuidCanonicalTextual.description: A string of hex words separated by hyphens of length 8-4-4-4-12.

LeftRightDot.description: Lowercase alphanumeric words separated by periods, most significant word (on the left) starting with an alphabet character.

SupervisorContainerStatus000.name: supervisor.container.status.000
SupervisorContainerStatus000.description: Manages lifecycle of the docker containers where GridWorks actors run

oneOf.title: Authorized
oneOf.description: World has created the information for starting the container

oneOf.title: Provisioning
oneOf.description: Container has started, but is going through its provisioning process

oneOf.title: Running
oneOf.description: GNode actors in the container are active

WorldInstanceName.title: Name of the WorldInstance
WorldInstanceName.description: For example, d1__1 is a potential name for a World whose World GNode has alias d1.

SupervisorGNodeInstanceId.title: Id of the SupervisorContainer's prime actor (aka the Supervisor GNode)

SupervisorGNodeAlias.title: Alias of the SupervisorContainer's prime actor (aka the Supervisor GNode)
